00008 #ifndef GENERICIO_H_
00009 #define GENERICIO_H_
00010 
00011 
00012 
00013 #ifndef NO_RODOS_NAMESPACE
00014 namespace RODOS {
00015 #endif
00016 
00017 class IOEventReceiver {
00018 public:
00019         virtual void sendFinished() {}
00020         virtual void dataReady() { }
00021 };
00022 
00023 class GenericIOInterface {
00024 private:
00025 IOEventReceiver* ioEventReceiver;
00026 protected:
00027         void* context;
00028 public:
00029     GenericIOInterface() {ioEventReceiver=0; } // create all drivers static but do not init there
00030 
00031     /*** Implemented by each interface ****/
00032     virtual int init(...)   {return 0;}  // Virtual, but do not call using a pointer, each init differs
00033     virtual void reset() { }
00034     virtual int config(...) {return 0;}  // Virtual, but do not call using a pointer, each config differs
00035     virtual int status(...) {return 0;}  // Virtual, but do not call using a pointer, each status differs
00036 
00037     virtual bool readyToSend()  {return false; }
00038     virtual bool dataReady()    {return false; }
00039 
00040     virtual int write(const char* sendBuf, int len)                                                             {return 0;}
00041     virtual int read(char* recBuf, int maxlen)                                                                          {return 0;}
00042     virtual int writeRead(const char* sendBuf, int len, char* recBuf, int maxlen)       {return 0;}
00043 
00044     /******* may be overridden by the user or received through IOEventREceiver, called by corrsponding driver  *****/
00045     virtual void upCallSendReady() {if(ioEventReceiver) ioEventReceiver->sendFinished(); } // last transmit order is concluded
00046     virtual void upCallDataReady() {if(ioEventReceiver) ioEventReceiver->dataReady();} // data has arrived
00047     void setIoEventReceiver(IOEventReceiver* receiver){
00048         ioEventReceiver=receiver;
00049     }
00050 };
00051 
00052 
00053 #ifndef NO_RODOS_NAMESPACE
00054 }
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #endif /* GENERICIO_H_ */
